title: Turkish residents struggle to access Twitter in earthquake aftermath
description: The government has a history of cracking down on social media giants after emergencies or scandals.

title: Twitter facing widespread outage, among first since Musk’s layoffs
description: Users across the site reported an inability to send tweets.

title: AI arms race kicks off as Google, Microsoft make dueling announcements
description: Google and Microsoft are rushing to put chatbots in search results, kicking off a new wave of the Big Tech arms race.

title: Live updates: Ex-Twitter execs to be grilled on Hunter Biden laptop ‘censorship’
description: A House Oversight hearing shows Elon Musk's Twitter working with the GOP to embarrass its previous leadership--and the president.

title: Newly empowered Republicans are coming for Big Tech, alleging collusion
description: A hearing about Elon Musk’s "Twitter Files" will fan allegations that Democrats pressure Silicon Valley to censor conservative views.
